name: Notifications for Android TV
description: Forward notifications from your mobile device immediately to your TV screen using Android TV. Including application logo and images contained in the notification. Scroll through every notified message on the Android TV in fullscreen mode. You can change the settings individually for each application.  Best working with these apps, but unlimited to every app which displays notifications: - Messenger apps: WhatsApp, SMS, Hangouts, Allo, Gmail - News apps: Spiegel Online Eilmeldung, SWR3 Eilmeldung  Also shows incoming and outgoing phone calls.  Important: You need to install the app Notifications for Android TV on your Android TV.   Immediate forwarding of your notifications to your Android TV  Browse through notification details on the TV screen including application logo and notification images  App specific settings including privacy mode  Supported devices: Nexus Player, Nvidia Shield, Philips Android TV devices, Sony Android TV devices, Xiaomi MI Box 4K and other Android TV devices.
